public class FeatherBlender
extends Blender
    \brief Simple blender which mixes images at its borders.

      • createWeightMaps

        @ByVal
public Rect createWeightMaps(@Const @ByRef
                                     UMatVector masks,
                                     @Const @ByRef
                                     PointVector corners,
                                     @ByRef
                                     UMatVector weight_maps)
        Creates weight maps for fixed set of source images by their masks and top-left corners. Final image can be obtained by simple weighting of the source images.
